Description:
Port handle or list of port handles on which to configure the user
defined statistic counters.
DEFAULT
	None

Configure the MAC destination address 1 filter.

	None

	None

	None

	None

	None

Offset for pattern1 in bytes.
DEFAULT
	None

Offset for pattern2 in bytes.
DEFAULT
	None

Not defined
Valid options are:
startOfFrame
	
(default) Offset from the start of the frame.
startOfIp
	
Offset from the start of the IP header
startOfProtocol
	
Offset from the start of the protocol
x
	
Offset from the start of the protocol
startOfSonet
	
Offset from the start of the SONET frame.
DEFAULT
	None

Not defined
Valid options are:
startOfFrame

startOfIp
	
Offset from the start of the IP header
startOfProtocol
	
Offset from the start of the protocol
x

Configure the MAC source address 2 filter.
DEFAULT
	None

Configure the MAC source address 1 mask filter.
DEFAULT
	None

Configure the MAC source address 2 mask filter.
DEFAULT
	None

Enable copy of the filter pallette configured with
::::packet_config_filter.
Valid options are:
0
	
(default) Do not copy the capture filter pallette
1
	
Copy the capture filter pallette settings for the options that were not
specified
x
	
Copy the capture filter pallette settings for the options that were not
specified
DEFAULT
	None
